skills.skill: Job scheduling tool experience (Autosys or CONTROL M)
Knowledge of production break/fix code changes and test cycle defect resolution
Industrial certification on ETL/Hadoop or other Data Engineering technology

duties_responsibilities.duty: Focus on ETL development within an existing development team.
Create complex mappings to extract data from source to target using Informatica.
Possess a broad understanding of multiple technologies including Mainframe, RDBMS, Master Data Management, Analytics, and UNIX shell scripting.
Execute production break/fix code changes and test cycle defect resolution.
Follow Agile development practices and manage version control/configuration management tools.
Integrate with Big Data Technologies and work within the Financial Services industry.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent (Industrial certification on ETL/Hadoop or other Data Engineering technology preferred)
